roleset.name: Snort mucus back up nose
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class hiccup-40.1.1. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Intransative example
example.text: The cold air made him snuffle.

example.name: Example with location
example.text: She could heat him snuffling behind her and gave him a tissue.

roleset.name: Sniff at inquiringly
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet mapping. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with location
example.text: The puppy snuffled the roses in the garden.

roleset.name: Snivel, cry, or whine with sniffling
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class manner_speaking-37.3. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with location
example.text: The child was snuffling in his room.

example.name: Imparative example
example.text: Stop [PRO] snuffling and fix the problem!
